author: Albert Einstein
quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.

author: Maya Angelou
quote: You will face many defeats in life, but never let yourself be defeated.

author: Oscar Wilde
quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

author: Nelson Mandela
quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.

author: Mark Twain
quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.

author: Confucius
quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.

author: Walt Disney
quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.

author: Babe Ruth
quote: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.

author: Helen Keller
quote: Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see a shadow.

author: Steve Jobs
quote: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.

author: Dr. Seuss
quote: Don’t cry because it’s over, smile because it happened.

author: Thomas Edison
quote: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.

author: John Lennon
quote: Life is what happens when you’re busy making other plans.

author: Mother Teresa
quote: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.

author: Mahatma Gandhi
quote: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.

author: Aristotle
quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.

author: Benjamin Franklin
quote: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.

author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
quote: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.

author: Abraham Lincoln
quote: The best way to predict your future is to create it.

author: Henry Ford
quote: Whether you think you can, or you think you can’t – you’re right.

author: Bruce Lee
quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.

author: Theodore Roosevelt
quote: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.

author: Leonardo da Vinci
quote: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.

author: Vince Lombardi
quote: Winning isn’t everything, but wanting to win is.

author: J.K. Rowling
quote: It is our choices that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.

author: Wayne Gretzky
quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.

author: Michael Jordan
quote: I’ve failed over and over and over again in my life and that is why I succeed.

author: Anne Frank
quote: Whoever is happy will make others happy too.

author: Pablo Picasso
quote: Everything you can imagine is real.

author: George Bernard Shaw
quote: Life isn’t about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.

author: Robert Frost
quote: In three words I can sum up everything I’ve learned about life: it goes on.

author: Confucius
quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.

author: William Shakespeare
quote: Some are born great, some achieve greatness, and some have greatness thrust upon them.

author: Plato
quote: The beginning is the most important part of the work.

author: Seneca
quote: Luck is what happens when preparation meets opportunity.

author: Dalai Lama
quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.

author: Marcus Aurelius
quote: You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.

author: Henry David Thoreau
quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.

author: Rumi
quote: What you seek is seeking you.

author: Zig Ziglar
quote: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.

author: Winston Churchill
quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.

author: C.S. Lewis
quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.

author: Buddha
quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.

author: Tony Robbins
quote: The only limit to your impact is your imagination and commitment.

author: Epictetus
quote: It’s not what happens to you, but how you react to it that matters.

author: Napoleon Hill
quote: Whatever the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve.

author: Oprah Winfrey
quote: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.

author: Jim Rohn
quote: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present.

author: Les Brown
quote: Shoot for the moon. Even if you miss, you'll land among the stars.

author: Elon Musk
quote: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.

author: Stephen Covey
quote: The key is in not spending time, but in investing it.

author: Carl Jung
quote: Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.

author: Charles Dickens
quote: No one is useless in this world who lightens the burden of it for someone else.

author: Ayn Rand
quote: The question isn’t who is going to let me; it’s who is going to stop me.

author: John Wooden
quote: Do not let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.

author: Jane Austen
quote: There is no charm equal to tenderness of heart.

author: Victor Hugo
quote: Even the darkest night will end and the sun will rise.

author: Herman Melville
quote: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.

author: Ernest Hemingway
quote: Courage is grace under pressure.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: The only way to have a friend is to be one.

author: J.R.R. Tolkien
quote: Not all those who wander are lost.

author: Mark Twain
quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
